name: Glide
description:
Harness the power of gravity in this relaxed, minimalist physics-puzzle game.

Touch the screen anywhere (or use keyboard) to enable gravity, and be pulled towards nearby orbs.

With 8 tough stages to play through, Glide will always provide a new challenge!

--------

Lose yourself in the beautiful minimalist design and a calming ambient soundtrack.

--------

Glide's short and sweet levels are perfect for the daily commute, or for short breaks - but you might have trouble putting it down!

Features include:
- Over 60 full levels
- Many different mechanics and themes to explore
- Varied difficulty
- Google Play Games integration (android only)
- Full visual accessibility options & colour customisation
- Achievements to show off to your friends!
